7#include "compiler/translator/ValidateAST.h"
8
9#include "compiler/translator/Diagnostics.h"
10#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermTraverse.h"
11
12namespace sh
13{
14
15namespace
16{
17
18class ValidateAST : public TIntermTraverser
19{
20 public:
21 static bool validate(TIntermNode *root,
22 TDiagnostics *diagnostics,
23 const ValidateASTOptions &options);
24
25 void visitSymbol(TIntermSymbol *node) override;
26 void visitConstantUnion(TIntermConstantUnion *node) override;
27 bool visitSwizzle(Visit visit, TIntermSwizzle *node) override;
28 bool visitBinary(Visit visit, TIntermBinary *node) override;
29 bool visitUnary(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node) override;
30 bool visitTernary(Visit visit, TIntermTernary *node) override;
31 bool visitIfElse(Visit visit, TIntermIfElse *node) override;
32 bool visitSwitch(Visit visit, TIntermSwitch *node) override;
33 bool visitCase(Visit visit, TIntermCase *node) override;
34 void visitFunctionPrototype(TIntermFunctionPrototype *node) override;
35 bool visitFunctionDefinition(Visit visit, TIntermFunctionDefinition *node) override;
36 bool visitAggregate(Visit visit, TIntermAggregate *node) override;
37 bool visitBlock(Visit visit, TIntermBlock *node) override;
38 bool visitGlobalQualifierDeclaration(Visit visit,
39 TIntermGlobalQualifierDeclaration *node) override;
40 bool visitDeclaration(Visit visit, TIntermDeclaration *node) override;
41 bool visitLoop(Visit visit, TIntermLoop *node) override;
42 bool visitBranch(Visit visit, TIntermBranch *node) override;
43 void visitPreprocessorDirective(TIntermPreprocessorDirective *node) override;
44
45 private:
46 ValidateAST(TIntermNode *root, TDiagnostics *diagnostics, const ValidateASTOptions &options);
47
48 // Visit as a generic node
49 void visitNode(Visit visit, TIntermNode *node);
50
51 void expectNonNullChildren(Visit visit, TIntermNode *node, size_t least_count);
52
53 bool validateInternal();
54
55 ValidateASTOptions mOptions;
56 TDiagnostics *mDiagnostics;
57
58 // For validateSingleParent:
59 std::map<TIntermNode *, TIntermNode *> mParent;
60 bool mSingleParentFailed = false;
61
62 // For validateNullNodes
63 bool mNullNodesFailed = false;
64};
65
66bool ValidateAST::validate(TIntermNode *root,
67 TDiagnostics *diagnostics,
68 const ValidateASTOptions &options)
69{
70 ValidateAST validate(root, diagnostics, options);
71 root->traverse(&validate);
72 return validate.validateInternal();
73}
74
75ValidateAST::ValidateAST(TIntermNode *root,
76 TDiagnostics *diagnostics,
77 const ValidateASTOptions &options)
78 : TIntermTraverser(true, false, true, nullptr), mOptions(options), mDiagnostics(diagnostics)
79{}
80
81void ValidateAST::visitNode(Visit visit, TIntermNode *node)
82{
83 if (visit == PreVisit && mOptions.validateSingleParent)
84 {
85 size_t childCount = node->getChildCount();
86 for (size_t i = 0; i < childCount; ++i)
87 {
88 TIntermNode *child = node->getChildNode(i);
89 TIntermNode *&parent = mParent[child];
90 if (parent)
91 {
92 // If child is visited twice but through the same parent, the problem is in one of
93 // the ancestors.
94 if (parent != node)
95 {
96 mDiagnostics->error(node->getLine(), "Found child with two parents",
97 "<validateSingleParent>");
98 mSingleParentFailed = true;
99 }
100 }
101
102 parent = node;
103 }
104 }
105}
106
107void ValidateAST::expectNonNullChildren(Visit visit, TIntermNode *node, size_t leastCount)
108{
109 if (visit == PreVisit && mOptions.validateNullNodes)
110 {
111 size_t childCount = node->getChildCount();
112 if (childCount < leastCount)
113 {
114 mDiagnostics->error(node->getLine(), "Too few children", "<validateNullNodes>");
115 mNullNodesFailed = true;
116 }
117
118 for (size_t i = 0; i < childCount; ++i)
119 {
120 if (node->getChildNode(i) == nullptr)
121 {
122 mDiagnostics->error(node->getLine(), "Found nullptr child", "<validateNullNodes>");
123 mNullNodesFailed = true;
124 }
125 }
126 }
127}
128
129void ValidateAST::visitSymbol(TIntermSymbol *node)
130{
131 visitNode(PreVisit, node);
132}
133
134void ValidateAST::visitConstantUnion(TIntermConstantUnion *node)
135{
136 visitNode(PreVisit, node);
137}
138
139bool ValidateAST::visitSwizzle(Visit visit, TIntermSwizzle *node)
140{
141 visitNode(visit, node);
142 return true;
143}
144
145bool ValidateAST::visitBinary(Visit visit, TIntermBinary *node)
146{
147 visitNode(visit, node);
148 return true;
149}
150
151bool ValidateAST::visitUnary(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node)
152{
153 visitNode(visit, node);
154 return true;
155}
156
157bool ValidateAST::visitTernary(Visit visit, TIntermTernary *node)
158{
159 visitNode(visit, node);
160 return true;
161}
162
163bool ValidateAST::visitIfElse(Visit visit, TIntermIfElse *node)
164{
165 visitNode(visit, node);
166 return true;
167}
168
169bool ValidateAST::visitSwitch(Visit visit, TIntermSwitch *node)
170{
171 visitNode(visit, node);
172 return true;
173}
174
175bool ValidateAST::visitCase(Visit visit, TIntermCase *node)
176{
177 visitNode(visit, node);
178 return true;
179}
180
181void ValidateAST::visitFunctionPrototype(TIntermFunctionPrototype *node)
182{
183 visitNode(PreVisit, node);
184}
185
186bool ValidateAST::visitFunctionDefinition(Visit visit, TIntermFunctionDefinition *node)
187{
188 visitNode(visit, node);
189 return true;
190}
191
192bool ValidateAST::visitAggregate(Visit visit, TIntermAggregate *node)
193{
194 visitNode(visit, node);
195 expectNonNullChildren(visit, node, 0);
196 return true;
197}
198
199bool ValidateAST::visitBlock(Visit visit, TIntermBlock *node)
200{
201 visitNode(visit, node);
202 expectNonNullChildren(visit, node, 0);
203 return true;
204}
205
206bool ValidateAST::visitGlobalQualifierDeclaration(Visit visit,
207 TIntermGlobalQualifierDeclaration *node)
208{
209 visitNode(visit, node);
210 return true;
211}
212
213bool ValidateAST::visitDeclaration(Visit visit, TIntermDeclaration *node)
214{
215 visitNode(visit, node);
216 expectNonNullChildren(visit, node, 0);
217 return true;
218}
219
220bool ValidateAST::visitLoop(Visit visit, TIntermLoop *node)
221{
222 visitNode(visit, node);
223 return true;
224}
225
226bool ValidateAST::visitBranch(Visit visit, TIntermBranch *node)
227{
228 visitNode(visit, node);
229 return true;
230}
231
232void ValidateAST::visitPreprocessorDirective(TIntermPreprocessorDirective *node)
233{
234 visitNode(PreVisit, node);
235}
236
237bool ValidateAST::validateInternal()
238{
239 return !mSingleParentFailed && !mNullNodesFailed;
240}
241
242} // anonymous namespace
243
244bool ValidateAST(TIntermNode *root, TDiagnostics *diagnostics, const ValidateASTOptions &options)
245{
246 return ValidateAST::validate(root, diagnostics, options);
247}
248
249} // namespace sh
